bug.author: catherinealvarado
bug.description:
I wrote the following function to get POS tags for sentences: <denchmark-code>def pos_tup_list(s): processed = nlp(s) tup_list = [] for token in processed: tup_list.append((str(token),token.pos_)) return tup_list </denchmark-code>
When I check the tags for my, your, his, her, its, our, their, and ours I get incorrect tags. Look below: print(pos_tup_list("My cat is cute")) print(pos_tup_list("Your cat is cute.")) print(pos_tup_list("His cat is brown.")) print(pos_tup_list("Her dog is cute!")) print(pos_tup_list("The cat hurt its paw.")) print(pos_tup_list("Our plane won.")) print(pos_tup_list("Their plane won.")) print(pos_tup_list("Maybe it is ours")) [('My', 'ADJ'), ('cat', 'NOUN'), ('is', 'VERB'), ('cute', 'ADJ')] [('Your', 'ADJ'), ('cat', 'NOUN'), ('is', 'VERB'), ('cute', 'ADJ'), ('.', 'PUNCT')] [('His', 'ADJ'), ('cat', 'NOUN'), ('is', 'VERB'), ('brown', 'ADJ'), ('.', 'PUNCT')] [('Her', 'ADJ'), ('dog', 'NOUN'), ('is', 'VERB'), ('cute', 'ADJ'), ('!', 'PUNCT')] [('The', 'DET'), ('cat', 'NOUN'), ('hurt', 'VERB'), ('its', 'ADJ'), ('paw', 'NOUN'), ('.', 'PUNCT')] [('Our', 'ADJ'), ('plane', 'NOUN'), ('won', 'VERB'), ('.', 'PUNCT')] [('Their', 'ADJ'), ('plane', 'NOUN'), ('won', 'VERB'), ('.', 'PUNCT')] [('Maybe', 'ADV'), ('it', 'PRON'), ('is', 'VERB'), ('ours', 'ADJ')]

comments.comment: Thanks! I think this is probably related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/593>#593</denchmark-link>
Closing this, since it definitely seems to be related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/593>#593</denchmark-link> . The issue will be fixed with the next data release!
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
